channel.title: [Class suggestion] The Executioner
channel.description:
The Executioner - Neutral killer
Passive: Two faced - Night and Occupy immune. Players will think their action succeeded on you.
Day ability: Disable - Disable the targets day abilitys for the rest of the day. (4 uses)
Night ability: Judgement - Chose up to 2 players and check if they are unseen or cult. If you find they are then Execute them. If not then frame them this night and the next. (Unlimited)
Goal: Eliminate all other factions. (normal NK goal)

item.title: [Class suggestion] The Executioner
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Read the ability carefully. “People that he finds to be Unseen/Cult”. Since when he doesn’t he frames them for 2 night that means that if you target the same person twice in a row you will always attack them.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] The Executioner
item.dc:creator: jabba
item.description:
Giving him a huge kill potential against scum is just dooming them to a lost game, while ultimately not helping the Executioner either because then it’ll be just him and a bunch of BD. Too many people don’t realize that NK and scum need to work together for at least the first couple nights in order to maximize BD losses, regardless if NK is poss or reaper.

Read full topic
